product_overview: DuduFisio-AI is an integrated management system for physiotherapy clinics, combining traditional clinical management features with Artificial Intelligence assistance to optimize patient care, clinical documentation, and operational management.
core_goals: Digitize and automate physiotherapy clinical processes
Enhance the quality of clinical documentation using AI
Increase operational efficiency and patient satisfaction
key_features: Comprehensive patient management with electronic medical records and interactive body maps
Robust appointment scheduling system with conflict prevention, recurring appointments, and notifications
Rich clinical documentation using SOAP notes with templates, auto-save, and version control
AI Assistant for automatic report generation, treatment protocol suggestions, risk analysis, and financial insights
Extensive exercise library with multimedia support, personalized prescriptions, and contraindication alerts
Secure patient portal for access to personal records, exercises, scheduling and direct communication
Dashboards and reports for operational, clinical, and financial analytics with interactive graphs
Financial management including payments, invoicing, multiple payment methods, and PIX integration
Stock management for materials and equipment with alerts and history tracking
Task management with prioritization, status tracking, and notifications
user_flow_summary: Users authenticate and access role-based dashboards (Administrator, Physiotherapist, Intern, Patient)
Administrators manage users, financials, stock, and clinics data
Physiotherapists handle patient records, clinical documentation, AI-assisted reports, and appointments
Interns access limited patient and scheduling information for observation and learning
Patients login to view their records, exercises, schedule appointments, and communicate with the clinic
Appointments are scheduled, notified, and status-tracked via the calendar system
Clinical documentation is created and edited with rich text editors and AI-generated suggestions
Financial transactions are processed with multiple payment integrations and tracked
Notifications and alerts are sent through various communication channels
validation_criteria: The system validates user registration with email and role-based access control
Duplicate patient records are prevented with CPF validation and advanced search filters
Appointment conflicts are automatically prevented and recurring scheduling supported
Clinical notes support auto-save, version history, and template customization
AI-generated reports meet 95% accuracy as tested with clinical data
Patient portal provides secure access with personal data and communications
Financial operations support multiple payment methods and produce accurate reports
System complies with LGPD, encrypts sensitive data, and logs all access and changes
Load time requirements are met with PWA offline support and 99.5% uptime
Automated end-to-end tests cover critical flows like login, appointments, medical records, and payments

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Sistema de autenticação com Supabase, suporte a OAuth (Google, GitHub), 2FA e controle de roles

features.name: Medical Records System
features.description: Sistema completo de prontuário eletrônico médico com padrões HL7 FHIR, assinatura digital e compliance CFM/COFFITO/LGPD

features.name: Dashboard System
features.description: Sistema de dashboards multi-role com interfaces específicas para pacientes, terapeutas e administradores

features.name: Appointment Management
features.description: Sistema de agendamento com calendário, check-in/check-out, notificações e gestão de sessões

features.name: AI Integration
features.description: Integração com Google Gemini AI para prescrições inteligentes, análise de dados e assistência clínica

features.name: Communication System
features.description: Sistema de comunicação com WhatsApp Business, email (Resend), SMS (Twilio) e notificações push

features.name: Payment System
features.description: Sistema de pagamentos integrado com Stripe, Mercado Pago e PIX para cobrança de consultas

features.name: Analytics and BI
features.description: Sistema de business intelligence com métricas clínicas, relatórios financeiros e analytics avançados

features.name: Patient Management

features.name: Template System

features.name: Integration Tests

features.name: Security and Compliance

features.name: Notification System
